name: AndroLab
description:
Hi, the game was created in a week for 139th Weekly GameJam Edition with "Followers" theme.

Controls:
R - restart level
Ctrl/C - crouch
AD - move
Space/W - jump

New levels and features are coming soon!

Planned to add:
- more levels and mechanics
- improvement of observation mechanic
- more soundtracks and sound effects
- more objects
- and more animations!

Leave us some feedback, so we know what to work on!
If you liked that game/idea and want to support us, consider donation option <3
